==Chinese==
{{zh-see|國境}}

----

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こく|k1=こっ|きょう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=こっきょう}} {{m|zh|sc=Hani|國境}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|こっきょう|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こっきょう|kyu=國境}}

# a [[national]] or [[country]] [[border]], a [[frontier]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|国境なき医師団|^こっきょう ^なき ^いしだん}}: [[w:Doctors Without Borders|Doctors Without Borders]], [[w:Médecins Sans Frontières|Médecins Sans Frontières]]
* {{ja-r|国境税|こっきょうぜい}}, {{ja-r|国境関税|こっきょう かんぜい}}: a border [[tariff]], border [[customs]]: a [[tax]] paid on foreign [[goods]] crossing a border
* {{ja-r|国境税関|こっきょう ぜいかん}}: a border or frontier [[customs]] [[house]], a building or facility used to inspect goods and levy appropriate customs tariffs; the border customs [[official]]s or [[authority|authorities]]
* {{ja-r|国境警備兵|こっきょう けいび へい}}: a border or frontier [[guard]], a [[soldier]] guarding a border or frontier
* {{ja-r|国境線|こっきょうせん}}: a [[border]], a border [[line]]
* {{ja-r|国境地帯|こっきょう ちたい}}: a border or frontier [[region]], the region along a border
* {{ja-r|国境地方|こっきょう ちほう}}: a border region, a region [[abut]]ting a border: a [[borderland]]
* {{ja-r|国境紛争|こっきょう ふんそう}}: a border [[dispute]]
* {{ja-r|国境貿易|こっきょう ぼうえき}}: border or frontier [[trade]]
